name: NSSF-CON.05
query:
SELECT          ss.company                         AS "Company::", 
                CONCAT_WS(' ', 'P O Box', p_o_box) AS "Company Address::", 
                ss.employee                        AS "Emp ID::", 
                ss.employee_name                   AS "Employee Name::", 
                SUM(ss.gross_pay)                  AS "Gross Pay:Currency:", 
                SUM(ss.gross_pay * 0.2)            AS "Contribution:Currency:", 
                emp.pension_fund_number            AS "Membership No::", 
                np.payment_date                    AS "Payment Date::", 
                np.payment_method                  AS "Payment Method::", 
                np.payment_reference_number        AS "Ref No.::" 
FROM            `tabSalary Slip` ss 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd 
ON              sd.parent = ss.name 
LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabEmployee` emp 
ON              ss.employee = emp.name 
AND             emp.pension_fund = 'NSSF' 
INNER JOIN      `tabCompany` cp 
ON              ss.company = cp.company_name 
JOIN            `tabNSSF Payments` np 
WHERE           sd.salary_component = 'Basic' 
AND             ss.docstatus = 1 
AND             np.payroll_month BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s 
AND             ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s 
AND             ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s 
GROUP BY        ss.employee_name, 
                ss.designation, 
                emp.gender, 
                emp.date_of_birth 
HAVING          SUM(ss.gross_pay) > 0
